name: Create Pull Request PR
description: Process for creating a pull request

name: Create Unit Tests
description: All unit tests needed should be created

name: Checkstyles have been run on all changed files
description: Run checkstyle or linting or whatever style guide there is

name: Run integration tests
description: Could be eval or integration or behavioural tests

name: Identify reviewers to add to PR
description: Can be important to reach out ahead of time that this is going to happen

name: Testing completed end-to-end
description: Did you ensure all outcomes listed in the ticket are ticked off? Verify verify and get help
